purpose: Isolated and cryptographically attested execution of metric calculations ($S	ext{-}01$, $S	ext{-}02$ $), enforcing strict compliance with the MEC ruleset before L5 registration.

logic.2_isolation: Execute calculation in sandboxed, non-persistent environment.
logic.3_output_signature: Sign metric outputs ($S	ext{-}01$, $S	ext{-}02$) using MEE Attestation Key (MAK).
